title: Do rioters still play with you after your 1000th win?
body: I just got my 1000th win and I was wondering if I could get a rioter to play with :)

replies.body: Pls add meh! Usually we try to get in on the 1k, but that's a lot of effort. I can play tonight at around 10pm PST hopefully :D

That would be great, but we have exams this week and 10PM would be a bit late :(
Maybe sometime later though?
Sounds good! Just add me and keep an eye out :D
Do you play with anyone? I'll friend you :3
I can't play right now (about to leave), but I'll catch you later! Maybe you can join Ex Salted and I later tonight :3

lol where did urgot come from?

oh maybe i didnt see him cuz noone plays him..

lol no but really hes on the list of reworks
@Riot Koalifier, is that per season or per total games played? This season I have 453 wins and 892 games played in ranked. I'd love to play with someone from Riot!

Granted I only have a little over 100 wins and am not yet level 30, I just wanted to say that this thread made my day. Seeing Rioters interact and play with members of the community is fantastic and exciting. This by all means is not a request to play, (I'm not yet worthy anyways), but it's nice to know I get a type of reward at 1000 wins. :D
I never knew this and I been playing since season 1 and have about 2k wins if you counted every game mode
I usually go by the number that displays in your preferred queue of choice (SR blind pick for me).
Im at 1084, is that too late to play one too?
